quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving. – Albert Einstein
fact: The shape of plant collenchyma’s cells and the shape of the bubbles in beer foam are the same - they are orthotetrachidecahedrons.
joke: I adopted my dog from a blacksmith. As soon as we got home he made a bolt for the door.
